name: Predaplast
description: Reveal any number of "Predap" cards in your hand, then target that many face-up monsters your opponent controls; place 1 Predator Counter on each of those monsters, and if you do, any of those monsters that are Level 2 or higher become Level 1 as long as they have a Predator Counter. If a "Predaplant" monster you control would be destroyed by battle, you can banish this card from your GY instead.
